Narrator: You have realized. You have died and returned. You could say that the clerk is half right.
But this is the second time you fell into your demise.
So, you turned around and decided to go to the other side.
But you stopped on your tracks, and your face widened.
Beyond the hallway are three root creatures walking towards you.
Unlike the creature earlier, these three have legs. Therefore, they are capable of walking.

Dialogue.Me: Okay now, this is not looking great.
Narrator: Despite their numbers, you noticed them struggling to walk in the hallway, due to their size and walking together at the same time.
You took this opportunity and turned around. As you started running, you heard a rumble behind you.
Even though you do not want to look back, you still did and looked back at what transpired behind you.
Over there, the three root creatures seemed to stumble, and all of them laid atop each other.
You made a smirk.
But, as if betraying your confidence, the root creatures merged like roots tangling together.
They formed into a huge humanoid. An amalgamation of the three root creatures.
Without further ado, you began running away.
The huge root creature followed suit. Every step made the dungeon tremble.
You reached a pile of garbage and made an attempt to climb past it.
But the root creature immediately reached you with its speed and dashed on you. You, with the pile of garbage, are thrown away with the momentum.
You fell to the ground and rolled down with the trash, with some debris and glass shards piercing through your body.
And when the momentum on your body disappeared, the root creature reached you and kicked your body, throwing you away.
Your body hit on wreckage, scattering it into debris as you roll down the ground once again.
As soon as the momentum is lost, you try to get on your knees.
But the root creature reached your position once again, and it gave you another kick and sent you flying.
Your body hit a wall, suddenly stopping it, and broke everything inside you at once.
Your body slid and slumped on the ground, leaning towards the wall, and coughed a blood.
With little strength remained on you, you shouted your complaint.

Dialogue.Me: Isn’t this trial too difficult??!!! Isn’t this too much just to get asylum??!!
Narrator: The root creature reached your position and suddenly stopped before your body. It moved up its leg and kicked your body.
It was instant. You died instantly.
